name: response code is validated when an API call is made

testSteps.description: response code is validated when an API call is made #1: {value=200, node=name, nodevalue=[Churchgate]}

children.description:
Given I submit dynamic query parameters
| queryParam | queryParamValue |
| query | Churchgate |
| key | AIzaSyBrhdZP1wWpMXVEvzpY4-3W-FKieCYhVXg |
When I submit an API call
Then I should get a valid response of: '200'
And the response should contain this 'name' and '[Churchgate]'

title: response code is validated when an API call is made

dataTable.scenarioOutline:
Given I submit dynamic query parameters
|queryParam	|queryParamValue						|
|query		|Churchgate								|
|key		|AIzaSyBrhdZP1wWpMXVEvzpY4-3W-FKieCYhVXg|

When I submit an API call
Then I should get a valid response of: '<value>'
And  the response should contain this '<node>' and '<nodevalue>'
